oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A review of the literature published in 2013 on topics relating to the fate of emerging environmental pollutants during wastewater treatment is presented. This review is divided into the following sections: emerging biological agents, estrogens, metals, nanomaterials, nutrients, persistent organic pollutants, pharmaceuticals and personal care products and herbicide, and trace organic contaminants
